original: 至日滿乃可即試印術方爾。
analyzed: 至日滿乃可即試印術方爾。
translated: When the day is full, one can then try the seal technique.

original: 試印效法第一　世尊。
analyzed: 試印效法第一　世尊。
translated: Try the seal, the first method, World-Honored One.
If one wears it, it will have the power of the seal.
When wanting to try it, take seven cloves.
Seal them with the seal.
Each time it is hit, they will be crushed.
Mix them with water and swallow them.🔽In an instant, one will attain the wisdom of the seal.

original: 須臾即得□□智　若欲求他心智者。
analyzed: 須臾即得□□智　若欲求他心智者。
translated: If one wants to seek the wisdom of knowing others' minds,
also take two cloves and swallow them dry.
Then seal one's mouth three times with the seal.
Instantly one will attain the wisdom of knowing others' minds.

original: 預知三生之事　又法。
analyzed: 預知三生之事　又法。
translated: One will be able to foresee events of three lifetimes.
Furthermore, take a skull of a dead person.
Regardless, seal it seven times with the seal.

original: 世間一切惡鬼並悉來降伏　又法。
analyzed: 世間一切惡鬼並悉來降伏　又法。
translated: All evil ghosts in the world will come and submit.

original: 若欲求役使百千萬種神金剛等類。
analyzed: 若欲求役使百千萬種神金剛等類。
translated: Furthermore, if one wants to command hundreds of thousands of kinds of gods, vajra-warriors, and others,

original: 取桑根皮一斤煮令爛去惡皮。
analyzed: 取桑根皮一斤煮令爛去惡皮。
translated: take one jin of mulberry root bark, boil it until soft, and remove the bad skin.
Seal it with the seal.
Eat in turn and repeat.

original: 萬鬼並來降伏□□信息並亦預　又法。
analyzed: 萬鬼並來降伏□□信息並亦預　又法。
translated: Ten thousand ghosts will all come and submit.
Take one sheng of pure sand.
Seal it with the seal.

original: 於四方□之□□□□並悉得脫　又法。
analyzed: 於四方□之□□□□並悉得脫　又法。
translated: Scatter it in the four directions. All will be freed.
Take three sheng of well water.
Seal it with the seal.

original: 四方散一切枯□□□□□潤益　又法。
analyzed: 四方散一切枯□□□□□潤益　又法。
translated: Scatter it in the four directions. All withered things will be nourished.
Take three sheng of yellow sand.
Seal it with the seal.
Buried in the ground.

original: 一日變成黃金　又法。
analyzed: 一日變成黃金　又法。
translated: In one day it will turn into gold.
Take seven strands of hair from a person wearing the seal.
Seal it with the seal.
Throw it on the ground.
It will turn into black earth.
A person wearing the seal takes a snake.
Seal it with the seal.
Seal it once.

original: 其蛇印死取之□□第一癩及瘻□無申等患。
analyzed: 其蛇印死取之□□第一癩及瘻□無申等患。
translated: The snake will die when sealed. Take it. The first leprosy and fistula, no more itching and other ailments.

original: 以蛇少許與服□□□□差　又法。
analyzed: 以蛇少許與服□□□□差　又法。
translated: Take a small amount of the snake and give it to the patient to eat, and the illness will be cured.

original: 若印人求出世間者。🔽取水三□煎。
analyzed: 若印人求出世間者。 取水三□煎。
translated: If a person seeks to leave the world,🔽take three liters of water and boil it.🔽Take the water and use it to wash the face and feet.

original: 取□□以□□□□同洗面及脚子時之間。
analyzed: 取□□以□□□□同洗面及脚子時之間。
translated: In an instant,

original: 從地踊出。🔽百寶蓮花承印□□□□□□人求騰空者。
analyzed: 從地踊出。 百寶蓮花承印□□□□□□人求騰空者。
translated: if a person seeks to fly,
take three liters of water and enchant it a hundred times.🔽Wash oneself and immediately one will be able to fly away.

original: 洗自立即便騰身而去　又發廣大心求萬法術者。
analyzed: 洗自立即便騰身而去　又發廣大心求萬法術者。
translated: If one wishes to attain the myriad methods with a vast mind,

original: 取椒一兩取水三升煎之。
analyzed: 取椒一兩取水三升煎之。
translated: take one liang of pepper and three liters of water and boil it.
Enchant it three times with the seal.

original: 分作三分。🔽平旦時服一分。
analyzed: 分作三分。 平旦時服一分。
translated: Divide it into three parts.🔽Take one part in the morning.
Take one part at noon.
Take one part in the evening.
One will become enlightened.
Then one will be able to understand the myriad dharmas.
One will be able to know the thirty-three heavens above,

original: 下知九十二億世界之□□□□□苦眾生並悉能救之　又法。
analyzed: 下知九十二億世界之□□□□□苦眾生並悉能救之　又法。
translated: Below, he knows the suffering of sentient beings in 92 koṭīs of worlds and is able to save them all.
Take three ounces of breast milk incense.
Seal it seven times.
The rākṣasas and all evil ghosts.

original: 皆發善心奉事和上亦□□□□□□□□□□並□□歸依　又法。
analyzed: 皆發善心奉事和上亦□□□□□□□□□□並□□歸依　又法。
translated: All give rise to wholesome thoughts and serve the preceptor.
Take one catty of cow ghee.
Refine and store it in a white porcelain bowl.
No more or less.
Seal it with the seal.
Take three ounces a day.
After taking it, you will naturally detest this body.
For me, it was invaded by evil thieves.
Abandoning the body,

original: 他世得生佛前　又法。
analyzed: 他世得生佛前　又法。
translated: in the next life, you will be reborn in front of the Buddha.
If you take seven white stones,
seal them with the seal,
and throw them into the water,
the river gods will all come out and dance.

original: 及諸毒龍並皆自歸依　又法。
analyzed: 及諸毒龍並皆自歸依　又法。
translated: And all the poisonous dragons will all take refuge.
The seal will form a jeweled pavilion.
World-Honored One.
The seal has been used by twenty koṭīs of Buddhas in the past.
All of them have been liberated through it.
If there are good men and good women.
Who simply seek to obtain this seal and wear it.
Even if they have committed offenses, they will be the same as the Buddha.

original: 但取印印隨意所須之處。
analyzed: 但取印印隨意所須之處。
translated: Furthermore, simply take the seal and stamp wherever it is needed.
It will immediately be destroyed.
If the seal is used on the body of a dead person who is still intact.
In their mouth.
Stamp the seal on them.

original: 變成灰土　又法。🔽取□少□□□□□□□□□□□　又法。
analyzed: 變成灰土　又法。 取□少□□□□□□□□□□□　又法。
translated: It will turn into ashes.🔽If the seal is used on a dead person whose body is incomplete.🔽Take a little bit of it.
Furthermore, take pine wood and stamp it with the seal.🔽It will immediately turn into a flowering tree.

original: 立變成花樹　又法□□□□□□□取桃木六尺。🔽以印印。
analyzed: 立變成花樹　又法□□□□□□□取桃木六尺。🔽以印印。
translated: Take peach wood six feet long.

original: 將行意欲去處隨意□□□□□□□世尊。
analyzed: 將行意欲去處隨意□□□□□□□世尊。
translated: When about to practice, one wishes to go to a place according to one's intention.🔽The seal, I myself transform my body and entrust it to the person in front.

original: 其印我自化身付囑前人□□□□□□□□□又世尊。
analyzed: 其印我自化身付囑前人□□□□□□□□□又世尊。
translated: Moreover, World-Honored One.🔽If this seal is in a world, it is always protected.

original: 此印若處世界恒被□□□□□□□□□□□□知唯有菩薩。
analyzed: 此印若處世界恒被□□□□□□□□□□□□知唯有菩薩。
translated: Only bodhisattvas know it.
The self-mastering one immediately obtains it.
The others do not see it. World-Honored One.
If there is someone who wears this seal,

analyzed: 印人二十萬種福不可得□□而說之　第一從無量世以來。
translated: The merit of sealing people of the twenty-thousand-fold world cannot be obtained and is not spoken of. The first is from immeasurable lifetimes ago.
Transmigrating through the six destinies.

original: 三業重障□□□□□□□□□□見此印便即除滅。
analyzed: 三業重障□□□□□□□□□□見此印便即除滅。
translated: The heavy hindrances of the three karmas are immediately eliminated upon seeing this seal.

analyzed: 得清涼勝報　第二無量劫來□□□□孝。
translated: One obtains the superior reward of coolness. The second is from immeasurable eons ago.🔽Lack of filial piety.
Drawing blood from the Buddha's body.
Killing an arhat.

analyzed: 誹謗三明大出長□□□□□□此印便永除斷無量重障。

analyzed: 得清淨□□□□□□□□□□□恒在地獄餓鬼畜生邊。
translated: Always in hell, hungry ghosts, and animals.
... countless hundreds of blessings adorn the body, the fourth...

analyzed: 若聞此印便得除斷無量□□□□　第五從無量年來。

For countless years, studying various dharmas and techniques.🔽One circle of this mudra...

analyzed: 求緣定□□□□□□□□□□□□□此印便得通達無邊智慧之門　□□□□□□□□□□□□便成無上道法　世尊。

Do not seek it from afar.

analyzed: 取灰一升□□□□□□□□□□□□□□此世界至於他方　又法。

Take it and wear it.
World-Honored One,
only those with karmic affinity,

Excellent, excellent!
Great being,

translated: Ābhi.

original: 及三明□□通神□□□□□□□□□□□□□□□龍八部諸大鬼王及諸夜叉王獸王□□□□□□□□□□□□□□□王鐵山王大鐵山王目真陀山王□陀□□□□□□□□□□□□□□□六欲天王。

translated: and the three knowledges, the divine powers, the dragons, the eight groups, the great ghost kings, the various yakṣa kings, the animal kings, the mountain kings, the iron mountain kings, the great iron mountain kings, the Muzhanda mountain kings, the Tuṣita Heaven kings, the six desire heaven kings.
All said, World-Honored One.
We will always protect and never abandon them for a moment.
The assembly was greatly delighted.
They single-mindedly cultivated and upheld.
Each respectfully offered to the Buddha on the four sides, praising the Buddha with loud voices.
Scattering flowers as offerings.

original: 龍種上尊王佛消息萬神勅□法　凡欲作此印者。
analyzed: 龍種上尊王佛消息萬神勅□法　凡欲作此印者。
translated: The Buddha of the Supreme King of the Dragon Species, the messenger of the myriad spirits, commands the Dharma. If one wishes to make this mudra,
myriad ghosts will gather.

original: 千神俱□□□此印□□□□□□□□□□坐臥無量者。
analyzed: 千神俱□□□此印□□□□□□□□□□坐臥無量者。
translated: A thousand spirits will all come. If one makes this mudra, one will attain immeasurable things.
One should immediately look with compassion and take a vow.

original: 若得□□□□□□□□□□□□凡欲所作法。🔽先以大母指掐離傳目□□□□□□□□□□□□不得成　又有外作法中。

translated: If one obtains the method, one will be able to accomplish all that one wishes to do.🔽Before performing any method, one should first use the thumb to pinch the eyes, and then one will be able to accomplish it. If one does not do this, it will not be successful. There is also another external method.
If one performs this method, it will not be successful. One should be joyful and able to do it.
If a person cultivates mudrā, they should first seal the place where they sit.
